Author: intertropical
Text: at least a part of it might be due to bloating? and I'm not sure if you feel the same way, but for me personally, whenever I feel shitty after bingeing, my self-perception becomes pretty distorted too, and I (probably) tend to think I'm bigger than I really am (even more than usual).   if it helps at all, I doubt that a week can make a really profound permanent difference to your appearance, even if you've been bingeing. give it some time and things might just go back to normal. stay strong <3
